```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = "/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r data import write csv,echo=FALSE,eval=FALSE}
# Methylation
# 450K
load("/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/probesFromPipeline.Rdata")
load("/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/sesame450K.batchAdj.Mmatrix.Rdata")
k450 <- as.data.frame(M.sesame.batch)
key_450k <- read.csv("/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/key.450K.csv",stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(k450)[match(key_450k$array,colnames(k450))] <- key_450k$samplekey
# EPIC
load("/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/sesameEPIC.batchAdj.Mmatrix.Rdata")
epic <- as.data.frame(M.sesame.batch)
key_epic <- read.csv("/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/key.EPIC.csv",stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(epic)[match(key_epic$array,colnames(epic))] <- key_epic$samplekey
# CSV
write.csv(as.data.frame(probesFromPipeline),
          file = "/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/probes.csv",row.names = F,na = "")
write.csv(k450,
          file = "/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/450k.csv",row.names = F,na = "")
write.csv(epic,
          file = "/Volumes/Tim/thesis/data/methylation/epic.csv",row.names = F,na = "")
```
